017package org.spongepowered.configurate.loader;
018
019import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
020
021import java.io.BufferedWriter;
022import java.io.FilterWriter;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.io.Writer;
025import java.nio.charset.Charset;
026import java.nio.file.Files;
027import java.nio.file.Path;
028import java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption;
029import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
030
031import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
032
033/**
034 * A utility for creating "atomic" file writers.
035 *
036 * <p>An atomic writer copies any existing file at the given path to a temporary location, then
037 * writes to the same temporary location, before moving the file back to the desired output path
038 * once the write is fully complete.</p>
039 */
040public final class AtomicFiles {
041    private AtomicFiles() {}
042
043    /**
044     * Creates and returns an "atomic" writer factory for the given path.
045     *
046     * @param path The path
047     * @param charset The charset to be used by the writer
048     * @return The writer factory
049     */
050    @NonNull
051    public static Callable<BufferedWriter> createAtomicWriterFactory(@NonNull Path path, @NonNull Charset charset) {
052        requireNonNull(path, "path");
053        return () -> createAtomicBufferedWriter(path, charset);
054    }
055
056    /**
057     * Creates and returns an "atomic" writer for the given path.
058     *
059     * @param path The path
060     * @param charset The charset to be used by the writer
061     * @return The writer factory
062     * @throws IOException For any underlying filesystem errors
063     */
064    @NonNull
065    public static BufferedWriter createAtomicBufferedWriter(@NonNull Path path, @NonNull Charset charset) throws IOException {
066        path = path.toAbsolutePath();
067
068        Path writePath = getTemporaryPath(path.getParent(), path.getFileName().toString());
069        if (Files.exists(path)) {
070            Files.copy(path, writePath, StandardCopyOption.COPY_ATTRIBUTES, StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);
071        }
072
073        BufferedWriter output = Files.newBufferedWriter(writePath, charset);
074        return new BufferedWriter(new AtomicFileWriter(writePath, path, output));
075    }
076
077    @NonNull
078    private static Path getTemporaryPath(@NonNull Path parent, @NonNull String key) {
079        String fileName = System.nanoTime() + requireNonNull(key, "key").replaceAll("\\\\|/|:",
080                "-") + ".tmp";
081        return parent.resolve(fileName);
082    }
083
084    private static class AtomicFileWriter extends FilterWriter {
085        private final Path targetPath, writePath;
086
087        protected AtomicFileWriter(Path writePath, Path targetPath, Writer wrapping) {
088            super(wrapping);
089            this.writePath = writePath;
090            this.targetPath = targetPath;
091        }
092
093        @Override
094        public void close() throws IOException {
095            super.close();
096            Files.createDirectories(targetPath.getParent());
097            Files.move(writePath, targetPath, StandardCopyOption.ATOMIC_MOVE, StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);
098        }
099    }
100}
